This project will be developed in collaboration with the University Rey Juan Carlos’s researchers: [Dr. Brezo Martínez](http://biodiversos.org/personal/brezo-martinez-diaz-caneja/), [Dr. Rosa M. Viejo](http://biodiversos.org/personal/rosa-ma-viejo-garcia/), [Dr. Miguel A. Olalla](http://olallalab.com/staff-member/dr-miguel-angel-olalla-tarraga/) and [Dr. Luis Cayuela](http://biodiversos.org/personal/luis-cayuela/#1550077812669-9a8e7543-6ec8), as well as [Dr. Francisco Arenas](https://www2.ciimar.up.pt/team.php?id=139) from CIIMAR (Oporto, Portugal). The project will run between January 2021 and December 2022.
